abstract: Timothy D. Sparapani, a lawyer at the American Civil Liberties Union, will join Facebook as its director of public policy, working from Washington.
snippet: Timothy D. Sparapani, a lawyer at the American Civil Liberties Union, will join Facebook as its director of public policy, working from Washington.
lead_paragraph: Privacy advocates who are gunning for the social network Facebook will soon have a familiar name to kick around.

headline.main: Facebook Gets New Public Policy Director
